data.prayer: Jesus, make the 6,410,291 people in the state of Pennsylvania who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pennsylvania, United States
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Pennsylvania, United States that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Pennsylvania, United States.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Pennsylvania, United States a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 12,798,900 people living in the state of Pennsylvania.
Lord, remember the Uyghur people. Make the Uyghur people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Pennsylvania, United States to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Pennsylvania that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Pennsylvania, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
